    • Uses of OrganizationCriteria in com.stormpath.sdk.organization

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.organization that return OrganizationCriteria 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static OrganizationCriteria Organizations.criteria()
      Returns a new OrganizationCriteria instance to use to formulate an Organization query.
      OrganizationCriteria OrganizationCriteria.orderByDescription()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by organization description.
      OrganizationCriteria OrganizationCriteria.orderByName()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by organization name.
      OrganizationCriteria OrganizationCriteria.orderByStatus()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by organization status.
      static OrganizationCriteria Organizations.where(Criterion criterion)
      Creates a new OrganizationCriteria instance using the specified criterion as the first query condition.
